TERM: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML)

DEFINITION:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML): Deep Learning:

Computer Vision:

By integrating advanced AI and ML techniques into the SPR_compressor system, we can enable the system to learn from data and make predictions or decisions, enhancing its ability to support decision-making and problem-solving.

Another potential area for exploration is the integration of advanced blockchain and distributed ledger technology to enable the system to provide secure and transparent data management and transactions.
